statements.select:
SELECT d1.DICTLIBRARYITEMID AS Dictlibraryitemid,d1.DICTLIBRARYID AS Dictlibraryid,d1.WUBICODE AS Wubicode,d1.PINYINCODE AS Pinyincode,d1.FASTCODE AS Fastcode,d1.ITEMNAME AS Itemname,d1.DISPLAYORDER AS Displayorder,d1.REMARK AS Remark,d1.ISACTIVE AS Isactive,d1.CREATEDATE AS Createdate,d2.LIBRARYCODE as Librarycode,d2.LIBRARYNAME as Libraryname FROM DICTLIBRARYITEM d1 inner join DICTLIBRARY d2 on d1.Dictlibraryid = d2.Dictlibraryid where d1.isactive=1
Dictlibraryitemid=#Dictlibraryitemid#
d1.DICTLIBRARYID =#Dictlibraryid#
Wubicode=#Wubicode#
Pinyincode=#Pinyincode#
Fastcode=#Fastcode#
Itemname=#Itemname#

SELECT DICTLIBRARYITEMID AS Dictlibraryitemid,DICTLIBRARYID AS Dictlibraryid,WUBICODE AS Wubicode,PINYINCODE AS Pinyincode,FASTCODE AS Fastcode,ITEMNAME AS Itemname,DISPLAYORDER AS Displayorder,REMARK AS Remark,ISACTIVE AS Isactive,CREATEDATE AS Createdate,LIBRARYCODE as Librarycode,LIBRARYNAME as Libraryname FROM (SELECT ROWNUM RN, t.* FROM (SELECT d1.Dictlibraryitemid,d1.Dictlibraryid,d1.Wubicode,d1.Pinyincode,d1.Fastcode,d1.Itemname,d1.Displayorder,d1.Remark,d1.Isactive,d1.Createdate,d2.Librarycode,d2.Libraryname FROM DICTLIBRARYITEM d1 inner join DICTLIBRARY d2 on d1.Dictlibraryid = d2.Dictlibraryid where 1=1
d1.Pinyincode like '%$strKey$%' or d1.Fastcode like '%$strKey$%' or d1.Itemname like '%$strKey$%'
d1.Dictlibraryid =$strDictlibraryid$
order by CREATEDATE desc,Dictlibraryitemid desc) t WHERE ROWNUM <=$pageEnd$ ) WHERE RN > = $pageStart$

SELECT Count(1) as pageCount FROM DICTLIBRARYITEM d1 inner join DICTLIBRARY d2 on d1.Dictlibraryid = d2.Dictlibraryid where 1=1
d1.Pinyincode like '%$strKey$%' or d1.Fastcode like '%$strKey$%' or d1.Itemname like '%$strKey$%'
d1.Dictlibraryid =$strDictlibraryid$
statements.delete: DELETE FROM DICTLIBRARYITEM WHERE DICTLIBRARYITEMID in($value$)
statements.select: select * from dictlibraryitem where dictlibraryid =(select Dictlibraryid from dictlibrary where librarycode =#value# ) order by dictlibraryitemid asc
